title: 999 Games - Outlet Sale Dashboard
description: 999 Games - Outlet Sale Dashboard is a Lumen 8.0 + Vue.js application styled with Tailwind CSS which provides an overview of the sales of the selected or current day.

title: 999 Games - Exit
description: Exit is a single product family website built with Nuxt.js, Tailwind CSS and Docker

title: 999 Games - B2B Sales Dashboard
description: 999 Games - B2B Sales Dashboard is a Laravel, Lumen + Vue.js application in which the Sales department of 999 Games has a single view of all the data they need.

title: 999 Games - B2B3
description: 999 Games - B2B3 replaced the B2B storefront built in Vue.js (Quasar), PHP (Laravel, Lumen, Symfony), Node, Docker and Elasticsearch with a micro service architecture

title: 999 Games - Menu
description: 999 Games - menu is a promotional single page which uses a Magento plugin to add products to a checkout hosted on the main website of 999 Games.

title: 999 Games - Adventskalendar
description: The advents calendar of 999 Games was made in Laravel and has been setup dynamically, so that no human actions are required when initiating an event. Each day shows a different gift and all gifts are only shown on the day that they have been planned.

title: 999 Games - Product Locator
description: The product locator is used to find locations of products in the outlet sale, the outlet sale is a on site sales event where customers can buy products against discounted prices.

title: Slim met muziek in de klas
description: Slim met muziek in de klas is a system where kids can take courses guided by music.

title: UserAdmin
description: UserAdmin is a Laravel product where the client can maintain users and their subscriptions. UserAdmin provides many features for a clean and functional subscription solution for any product.

title: Multi-site.nl
description: Multi-site.nl is a website builder based on Vebto's Architect (Laravel)

title: Knowledge Docs
description: Knowledge Docs is built with CodeIgniter where the client can build his Knowledge base with all the necessary features to make a intuitive and informate Knowledge base

title: Shoptrader POS
description: Shoptrader POS is a small but accessible and user friendly Point Of Sale system which is tied to the API of the framework of Shoptrader. Shoptrader POS provides a modern extension to direct sales in retail with QR, PIN and Cash payment methods.

title: Cloudcanyon
description: Cloudcanyon is a professional, creative and progressive IT company. We continuously explore the limits of the technologies we use. Creativity, effectiveness, quality and affordability are our keywords.
